synopsis.text: Mystery novelist Subaru Mikazuki, a 23-year-old introvert with a shy demeanor, finds social interactions challenging and prefers the solace of his books. Orphaned after a tragic accident, he leads a solitary life until a chance encounter with a stray cat, Haru, at his parents' grave. Despite his inexperience with caring for others, Subaru adopts Haru, who has lived a harsh life on the streets. As they navigate their new life together, the unlikely duo forms a unique bond, with Haru becoming Subaru's muse for his writing. Through their shared experiences, they learn to understand each other, finding happiness and companionship in their once lonely lives. This heartwarming tale, narrated from both human and feline perspectives, captures the joys and challenges of their day-to-day existence, illustrating the beauty of an unlikely friendship.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
